ocr-interpreted-text.ocr-interpreted-line: He told them that their conception of social services was wholly different - funda-
mentally different from that of Labour. They would provide an ambulance service for
the absolutely wretched — but it would not be too comfortable nor too easy to get.
Answering jeers that it was Labour which ﬁrst put a ceiling on health spending and
started charges, Mr. Brown reminded the hostile Government benches that was done
in 1950 because of the ﬁnancial strain of the Korean war.
